Components.Abstract.AST

Interface IASTComp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPAMOJAComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CASTComp

    public interface IASTComp
extends IPAMOJAComponent
    Provides methods for interacting connecting with other components. E.g, the Abstractor and AST2BoxTree components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAbstractionComp getAbstractor()
      Gets the value of Abstractor component connected to this AST component.
      CNode getASTStructure()
      Gets the structural representation of the AST.
      void setAbstractor(IAbstractionComp aAbstraction)
      Connects to the Abstractor component via its interface.
      void setASTStructure(CNode aASTStructure)
      Set the AST structure and notifies all observers about AST property change.

      • Methods inherited from interface Components.IPAMOJAComponent

        addPropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener

    • Method Detail

      • getASTStructure

        CNode getASTStructure()
        Gets the structural representation of the AST.
        Returns:
        the AST stored in this component.

      • setASTStructure

        void setASTStructure(CNode aASTStructure)
        Set the AST structure and notifies all observers about AST property change.
        Parameters:
        aASTStructure - the CNode object describing the AST structure.

      • setAbstractor

        void setAbstractor(IAbstractionComp aAbstraction)
        Connects to the Abstractor component via its interface. It sets the value of Abstractor, registers for property change events and retrieves current value of AST object.
        Parameters:
        aAbstraction - an instance of the Abstractor component.

      • getAbstractor

        IAbstractionComp getAbstractor()
        Gets the value of Abstractor component connected to this AST component.
        Returns:
        the Abstractor object connected to this AST object.
